snippet: Economic reports were mixed: factory orders rose more than expected, but business activity in the Midwest slipped.
abstract: Consumer confidence rises to a three-month high in August, increasing to 74.3, as households chip away at outstanding debt.
lead_paragraph: Economic reports were mixed: factory orders rose more than expected, but business activity in the Midwest slipped.

headline.main: Consumer Hopes Rose in August as Debt Fell
headline.print_headline: Consumer Hopes Rose In August As Debt Fell
